title: Spec Artifact v0.1
description: Schema for .ai/task-artifacts/<TASK-ID>/spec.yaml generated by the spec pass.

task_id.description: Task ID, e.g., "TASK-001". Must match the task ID in the prompt header.

author.description: Name of the operator who initiated the task

created_at.description: Timestamp when the spec artifact was created

acceptance_criteria.description: List of acceptance criteria for the task

branch_name_pattern.description: Pattern for the task branch name

initial_branch_name.description: Name of the initial branch for the task

first_commit_files.description: List of files to commit in the first commit of the task branch

first_commit_message.description: Commit message for the first commit of the task branch (multi-line string)

file.description: Path to the file relative to the project root directory

marker.description: Marker indicating where the change should be made relative to the file content

justification.description: Detailed explanation of why the change is needed

questions.description: List of questions to ask the operator during the spec pass
